lead_paragraph: BLUMENTHAL--Celia. December 31, 1952, died May 25, 2016. She was the beloved mother of Talia, Jesse and Jake Berger. Services, 12pm Thursday, Plaza Jewish Community Chapel. Donations appreciated in lieu of flowers. 1/3
